009package Point_Operations;
010
011import ij.ImagePlus;
012import ij.plugin.filter.PlugInFilter;
013import ij.process.ImageProcessor;
014
015public class Raise_Contrast implements PlugInFilter {
016
017        public int setup(String arg, ImagePlus img) {
018                return DOES_8G;
019        }
020    
021        public void run(ImageProcessor ip) {
022                int w = ip.getWidth();
023                int h = ip.getHeight();
024
025                for (int v = 0; v < h; v++) {
026                        for (int u = 0; u < w; u++) {
027                                int a = ip.get(u, v);
028                                int b = (int) (a * 1.5 + 0.5);
029                                if (b > 255)
030                                        b = 255;        // clamp to maximum value
031                                ip.set(u, v, b);
032                        }
033                }
034        }
035        
036}
